sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz'
import Stage from '../stage'
import BitmapText from './BitmapTextDocz'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"bitmaptext"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#bitmaptext"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`BitmapText`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.extras.BitmapText.html"}}>{`http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.extras.BitmapText.html`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#usage"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={`<Stage width={500} height={300} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xeef1f5 }}>
  <BitmapText
    anchor={0.5}
    x={250}
    y={150}
    text="Hello World!"
    style={{ font: \'50px Desyrel\' }}
  />
</Stage>`} __scope={{props,Stage,BitmapText}}>
  <Stage width={500} height={300} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xeef1f5 }}>
    <BitmapText anchor={0.5} x={250} y={150} text="Hello World!" style={{ font: '50px Desyrel' }}/>
  </Stage>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#example"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Make sure to load the bitmap font data before mounting.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`See `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://pixijs.io/examples/#/demos/text-demo.js"}}>{`https://pixijs.io/examples/#/demos/text-demo.js`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`import { render } from 'react-dom'
import { Stage, BitmapText } from '@inlet/react-pixi'

PIXI.loader
  .add('desyrel', './assets/desyrel.xml')
  .load(onAssetsLoaded)

const App = () => (
  <Stage>
    <BitmapText text="Hello World" style={{ font: '35px Desyrel' }}>
  </Stage>
)

function onAssetsLoaded() {
  render(<App />, document.getElementById('root'))
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
